lines.text: Locks, bolts and bars can't stop a bitch in heat!

Happy endings, nice and tidy, its a rule I, Learnt in school. Just get your money every Friday, happy endings are the rule. Keep on smiling, go home singing, and remember, that in life; you can love him, or you can hate him, but they'll always be Mack the Knife!
John is a goner and Jimmy is dead,
And George went crazy with the shooting.
But bloody is blood and red is bloody red,
And the Army goes on and on recruiting!
